business_law.name: Business Law
business_law.description: Legal matters related to business operations, contracts, disputes, and commercial transactions

describe.description: Any text - details about the business legal issue

sub_category.description: Specific type of business law matter

conversation_prompts.welcome: I understand you have a business law matter. Let me help you connect with qualified business attorneys in your area.
conversation_prompts.sub_category_prompt: What type of business legal issue do you need help with? This could be a contract dispute, business formation, buying/selling a business, or another business law matter.
conversation_prompts.describe_prompt: Please describe your business legal situation in detail. What specific issue or challenge are you facing?
conversation_prompts.has_attorney_prompt: Do you currently have an attorney representing you for this business matter?
conversation_prompts.contact_transition: Thank you for providing those details. Now I need to collect your contact information to connect you with qualified business law attorneys.

intellectual_property_law.name: Intellectual Property Law
intellectual_property_law.description: Legal matters related to patents, trademarks, copyrights, trade secrets, and other intellectual property rights

describe.description: Any text - details about the intellectual property matter

sub_category.description: Specific type of intellectual property matter

conversation_prompts.welcome: I understand you have an intellectual property matter. Let me help you connect with qualified IP attorneys who can protect your intellectual property rights.
conversation_prompts.sub_category_prompt: What type of intellectual property issue do you need help with? This could be related to patents, trademarks, copyrights, trade secrets, or another IP matter.
conversation_prompts.describe_prompt: Please describe your intellectual property situation in detail. What specific IP asset or issue are you dealing with? Include any relevant details about your invention, brand, creative work, or confidential information.
conversation_prompts.has_attorney_prompt: Do you currently have an attorney representing you for this intellectual property matter?
conversation_prompts.contact_transition: Thank you for providing those details about your IP matter. Now I need to collect your contact information to connect you with qualified intellectual property attorneys.

wills_trusts_estates.name: Wills, Trusts & Estates
wills_trusts_estates.description: Legal matters related to estate planning, wills, trusts, probate, and inheritance

describe.description: Any text - details about the estate planning or probate matter

sub_category.description: Specific type of estate planning or probate matter

conversation_prompts.welcome: I understand you have an estate planning or probate matter. Let me help you connect with qualified estate planning attorneys who can help protect your family's future.
conversation_prompts.sub_category_prompt: What type of estate planning or probate issue do you need help with? This could be creating a will or trust, handling a probate case, or planning for your family's financial future.
conversation_prompts.describe_prompt: Please describe your estate planning or probate situation in detail. Are you looking to create estate planning documents, dealing with a loved one's estate, or facing an inheritance issue?
conversation_prompts.has_attorney_prompt: Do you currently have an attorney representing you for this estate planning or probate matter?
conversation_prompts.contact_transition: Thank you for sharing those details about your estate matter. Now I need to collect your contact information to connect you with qualified estate planning attorneys.

estate_planning: Do you currently have a will or trust?
What assets do you need to plan for?
Are there any special family circumstances?
probate: When did your loved one pass away?
What state was the estate opened in?
Are there any disputes among family members?
trust_administration: What type of trust is involved?
Are you the trustee or beneficiary?

tax_law.name: Tax Law
tax_law.description: Legal matters related to federal and state tax issues, IRS disputes, tax planning, and tax compliance

describe.description: Any text - details about the tax issue or problem

sub_category.description: Specific type of tax problem or issue

conversation_prompts.welcome: I understand you have a tax issue that needs professional help. Let me connect you with qualified tax attorneys who can resolve your tax problems and protect your rights.
conversation_prompts.sub_category_prompt: What type of tax problem are you dealing with? This could be an IRS audit, unpaid taxes, wage garnishment, or another tax-related issue.
conversation_prompts.describe_prompt: Please describe your tax situation in detail. What specific tax problem are you facing? Include any notices you've received, amounts owed, or deadlines you're dealing with.
conversation_prompts.has_attorney_prompt: Do you currently have a tax attorney or representative helping you with this tax matter?
conversation_prompts.contact_transition: Thank you for sharing those details about your tax situation. Now I need to collect your contact information to connect you with experienced tax attorneys who can help resolve your issue.

audit_defense: What type of audit is it (correspondence, office, field)?
What tax years are being audited?
What issues is the IRS questioning?
Have you responded to the audit notice?
collection_issues: How much do you owe in back taxes?
Have you received any collection notices?
Has the IRS taken any collection actions?
business_tax: Is this payroll tax, income tax, or sales tax?
Are you personally liable for the taxes?
criminal_tax: Has a special agent contacted you?
Have you been charged with any crimes?

social_security_disability.name: Social Security Disability
social_security_disability.description: Legal matters related to Social Security Disability Insurance (SSDI) and Supplemental Security Income (SSI) claims, appeals, and benefits

personality.compassionate_intro: I understand you're dealing with a disability that's affecting your ability to work. Let me ask you some simple questions to connect you with qualified disability attorneys.

context_intros.denied: I'm sorry your disability claim was denied. Many people win on appeal with proper legal representation.
context_intros.benefits: Having issues with your disability benefits can be stressful. Let me help you find attorneys who can resolve these problems.
context_intros.applying: Applying for disability benefits can be overwhelming. I'll help connect you with attorneys who can guide you through the process.

field_questions.currently_receiving_benefits: {compassionate_intro} Are you already receiving disability benefits?
field_questions.have_worked: Have you worked at least 5 out of the last 10 years?
field_questions.out_of_work: Do you expect to be out of work for at least 12 months due to your condition?
field_questions.doctor_treatment: Are you currently being treated by a doctor for your condition?
field_questions.describe: Please describe your medical condition and how it affects your ability to work.
field_questions.has_attorney: Are you currently working with an attorney for your disability case?
field_questions.email: What email address should we use to contact you?
field_questions.phone: What's the best phone number to reach you?
field_questions.city: What city are you located in?

has_attorney.description: Are you currently working with an attorney?

doctor_treatment.description: Are you being treated by a doctor?

have_worked.description: Have You Worked At Least 5 Out Of Last 10 Years?

out_of_work.description: Do You Expect To Be Out Of Work At Least 12 Months?

conversation_prompts.welcome: I understand you need help with Social Security Disability benefits. Let me ask you some simple questions to connect you with qualified disability attorneys.
conversation_prompts.currently_receiving_benefits_prompt: Are you already receiving disability benefits?
conversation_prompts.have_worked_prompt: Have you worked at least 5 out of the last 10 years?
conversation_prompts.out_of_work_prompt: Do you expect to be out of work for at least 12 months due to your condition?
conversation_prompts.doctor_treatment_prompt: Are you currently being treated by a doctor for your condition?
conversation_prompts.describe_prompt: Please describe your medical condition and how it affects your ability to work.
conversation_prompts.has_attorney_prompt: Are you currently working with an attorney for your disability case?
conversation_prompts.contact_transition: Thank you for providing that information. Now I need to collect your contact details to connect you with experienced disability attorneys.

ssdi_requirements: Must have worked 5 out of last 10 years
Must have earned sufficient work credits
Condition must prevent substantial gainful activity
Condition must last or be expected to last 12+ months
ssi_requirements: Must have limited income and resources
Must be disabled, blind, or age 65+
Must be US citizen or qualified alien
Condition must prevent substantial gainful activity

age_considerations.younger_than_50: Harder to qualify, must prove cannot do any work
age_considerations.50_to_54: Grid rules begin to apply, education and work history matter more
age_considerations.55_to_59: Easier to qualify, especially with limited education
age_considerations.60_and_older: Much easier to qualify under grid rules

initial_application: What is your primary disabling condition?
What type of work did you do?
Are you seeing any doctors regularly?
appeal_stage: What stage is your case at?
Do you have new medical evidence?
Have you seen any new doctors?
benefits_issues: What type of benefits are you receiving?
What is the issue with your benefits?
Have you received any notices from SSA?
Do you need to report any changes?

civil_rights_law.name: Civil Rights Law
civil_rights_law.description: Legal matters related to civil rights violations, discrimination, police misconduct, and constitutional rights protection
subcategories: Immigration or Refugee Civil Rights Issues

describe.description: Any text - details about the civil rights violation or discrimination

allowed_values: immigration or refugee civil rights issues
sub_category.description: Specific type of civil rights violation or discrimination

conversation_prompts.welcome: I understand you may have experienced a civil rights violation or discrimination. Let me help connect you with qualified civil rights attorneys who can protect your rights and seek justice.
conversation_prompts.sub_category_prompt: What type of civil rights issue have you experienced? This could involve police misconduct, discrimination, constitutional rights violations, or other civil rights matters.
conversation_prompts.describe_prompt: Please describe what happened in detail. When and where did this occur? Who was involved? What specific actions or treatment did you experience that you believe violated your civil rights?
conversation_prompts.has_attorney_prompt: Do you currently have an attorney representing you for this civil rights matter?
conversation_prompts.contact_transition: Thank you for sharing your experience. Civil rights matters are serious, and you deserve proper legal representation. Let me collect your contact information to connect you with experienced civil rights attorneys.

police_misconduct: When and where did this incident occur?
Do you have any video or photo evidence?
discrimination: Did you file a complaint with any agency?
constitutional_rights: What specific actions were taken against you?
Have you filed any complaints or lawsuits?
retaliation: What civil rights activity were you engaged in?
What form did the retaliation take?
Can you prove a connection between your activity and the retaliation?
